Detailed Description

PluginManager class manages plugin loading. PluginManager is used to load plugins, manage the list of loaded plugins.

void PluginManager::LoadAvailablePlugins ( QDir  pluginsDirectory )

bool PluginManager::ValidDirectoryName ( QString &  directoryName ) [private]

Checks if the directoryName is a valid directory name. '.' and '..' are not valid names.
